headline: How New Jerseyâ€™s US$1.4 Billion Rate Case and Tax Refund Plan Could Impact American Water (AWK) Investors
summary: In January 2026, New Jersey American Water filed with the state Board of Public Utilities for new rates to support over US$1.40 billion of water and wastewater system investments through December 2026, while proposing expanded bill discounts and direct refunds of Gross Receipts Tax savings to customers. These moves highlight how American Water is trying to balance heavy, long-term infrastructure spending with customer affordability, regulatory engagement, and environmental stewardship...
